reg.acttitle: Hotel Room Tax Act; Provincial Sales Tax Act*
reg.title: Hotel Room Tax Regulation for the District of Tofino
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 109/2012, May 31, 2012]

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.
May 31, 2007 is the prescribed date after which section 3 of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the District of Tofino.
The tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the District of Tofino.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of tax
section.sectiontext: The District of Tofino may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the tax for tourism marketing, programs and projects.
This regulation is repealed effective June 1, 2017.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Hotel Room Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 207, sections 3 and 43 (2) (e) and (f)]
